additional_info:
Storeroom, Furniture, Technique, Internet, Cable-TV, Elevator, Heating system: gas, Hot water: electricity 
 For rent one-bedroom apartment in a prestigious district of Tbilisi - Vake, near the park (near the Russian consulate). The apartment has all the necessary modern appliances (refrigerator, washing machine, TV) and furniture. The apartment has heating and hot water, Internet and digital television. In a cozy housing landscaped courtyard and a nice window view of the city. The apartment is located on the 10th floor of a 12-storey building. 2 elevators and they work smoothly. Final price $ 350 per month. Tel. +995 597 770288 (Nikoloz); +995 574 474400 (Anna).
